quote: They have a got brilliant vision to turn Sirte ... into the next Dubai. The only thing they’ve got to do is clear the dead bodies.
more: Speaking about the potential of Sirte, the Libyan city where Muammar Gaddafi was killed, Johnson drew gasps and embarrassed laughter from the audience when he said: “There’s a group of UK business people, wonderful guys who want to invest in Sirte, on the coast, near where Gaddafi was actually captured and executed as some of you may have seen.”

quote: It is said that the Queen has come to love the Commonwealth, partly because it supplies her with regular cheering crowds of flag-waving piccaninnies.
more: In an article criticizing then prime minister Tony Blair and his trip to the Democratic Republic of Congo in 2002, Johnson referred to Commonwealth members on the continent as “flag-waving piccaninnies.”
